description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省岳阳市临湘市的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Linxiang City, Yueyang City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，自2021年10月起担任临湘市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as the Mayor of Linxiang since October 2021.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任临湘市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Mayor of Linxiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任临湘市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Mayor of Linxiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任临湘市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Mayor of Linxiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任临湘市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Mayor of Linxiang.

description.zh-cn: 临湘市人民政府的业务上级机构。
description.en: The superior business authority of the Linxiang Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 临湘市人民政府的组织上级机构。
description.en: The superior organizational authority of the Linxiang Municipal People's Government.

description.en: The superior organizational authority of the Linxiang Municipal People's Government.

nodes.id: 中国共产党临湘市人民政府党组

zh-cn: 中国共产党临湘市人民政府党组

description.zh-cn: 设置于临湘市人民政府的中国共产党党组。
description.en: The Party Leadership Group of the Communist Party of China within the Linxiang Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省的省级人民政府。
description.en: The provincial people's government of Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，临湘市人民政府所在的国家。
description.en: A country in East Asia, where the Linxiang Municipal People's Government is located.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省岳阳市下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Yueyang City, Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 刘琦自2021年10月起担任临湘市人民政府市长。
description.en: Liu Qi has served as the Mayor of the Linxiang Municipal People's Government since October 2021.

description.zh-cn: 龚卫国于2011年12月至2015年4月期间担任临湘市人民政府市长。
description.en: Gong Weiguo served as the Mayor of the Linxiang Municipal People's Government from December 2011 to April 2015.

description.zh-cn: 汪灿于2015年12月29日至2016年8月期间担任临湘市人民政府市长。
description.en: Wang Can served as the Mayor of the Linxiang Municipal People's Government from December 29, 2015, to August 2016.

description.zh-cn: 魏淑萍于2016年8月至2019年1月期间担任临湘市人民政府市长。
description.en: Wei Shuping served as the Mayor of the Linxiang Municipal People's Government from August 2016 to January 2019.

description.zh-cn: 廖星辉于2019年1月至2021年10月25日期间担任临湘市人民政府市长。
description.en: Liao Xinghui served as the Mayor of the Linxiang Municipal People's Government from January 2019 to October 25, 2021.

description.zh-cn: 根据Infobox信息，临湘市人民政府的业务上级机构是岳阳市人民政府。
description.en: According to the infobox, the superior business authority of the Linxiang Municipal People's Government is the Yueyang Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 根据Infobox信息，临湘市人民政府的组织上级机构是临湘市人民代表大会。
description.en: According to the infobox, the superior organizational authority of the Linxiang Municipal People's Government is the Linxiang Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 临湘市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据Infobox信息，临湘市人民政府的组织上级机构是临湘市人民代表大会常务委员会。
description.en: According to the infobox, the superior organizational authority of the Linxiang Municipal People's Government is the Standing Committee of the Linxiang Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中国共产党临湘市人民政府党组

description.zh-cn: 根据Infobox信息，中国共产党临湘市人民政府党组是临湘市人民政府内的中共本级机构。
description.en: According to the infobox, the Party Leadership Group of the CCP Linxiang Municipal People's Government is the Party organization at the corresponding level within the Linxiang Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 根据Infobox中的标志说明，临湘市人民政府的印章由湖南省人民政府制发。
description.en: According to the emblem description in the infobox, the seal of the Linxiang Municipal People's Government is issued by the Hunan Provincial People's Government.
